name: Turbo Cars 3D - Dodge Game of Avoid Car Obstacles
name_original: Turbo Cars 3D - Dodge Game of Avoid Car Obstacles
description:
Drive your car down the road and avoid obstacles. Your goal is to get as many kilometers as u can.
Get lives while driving your car. You can get protection which will protect you from the crash with another vehicle (taxi, truck, police car, normal car).
You can become one of the fastest drivers on the roads playing with your friends. Let's see who goes further.

Characteristics:
- Awesome 3D graphics
- Smooth and realistic driving
- City circuits
- You can tilt your device from side to side
You can download a version without ads.
